original_text: Jonathan, the son of Saul, had a son who was crippled in his feet. He was five years old when the news about Saul and Jonathan came from Jezreel, and his nurse took him up and fled, and as she fled in her haste, he fell and became lame. And his name was Mephibosheth.
korean_text: 사울의 아들 요나단에게 다리 저는 아들 하나가 있었으니 이름은 므비보셋이라 전에 사울과 요나단이 죽은 소식이 이스르엘에서 올 때에 그의 나이가 다섯 살이었는데 그 유모가 안고 도망할 때 급히 도망하다가 아이가 떨어져 절게 되었더라

sentences.original_text: who was crippled in his feet.
when the news about Saul and Jonathan came from Jezreel,
sentences.korean_translation: 사울과 요나단에 대한 소식이 이스르엘에서 왔을 때,

sentences.original_text: and his nurse took him up and fled,
and as she fled in her haste,
